categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Nadai Pawaro was a female Mirialan Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. In 3638 BBY, Nadai was part of Strike Team Oricon, a unit sent to the moon of Oricon to confront the powerful rogue Sith known as the Dread Masters. Nadai sold armor and weaponry, and she often meditated at the team's camp.

A vendor for the Jedi consular class on Oricon, Nadai was introduced on October 1, 2013, in Game Update 2.4 for the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel. Pawaro and the rest of the class gear vendors at Oricon, along with all other Daily Areas and high-level planets, were replaced by standardized vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015; she was replaced by Master Oh'dvek.
